name: SALVATOR
description: All souls around of the world were taken by the shadows beings and trapped in asteroids wandering through space, but there is an angel known as SALVATOR, that have the mission of rescue the souls to return them to home and save the world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 64 bits Processor: Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb dedicated, Compatible with Open GL 2.1 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bits Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: gtx series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: any
